posts.title: Understanding Your Vedic Kundali: A Beginner's Guide
posts.excerpt: Your birth chart holds the key to understanding your cosmic blueprint. Learn how to read your Kundali and unlock insights about your life path.
posts.content:
What is a Kundali?

A Vedic Kundali, or birth chart, captures the exact positions of planets at your birth. It's your cosmic blueprint.

Getting Started

Try our free Kundali generator at cosmicjyoti.com to create your chart in minutes.

posts.title: Gemstones for Planetary Remedies: A Quick Guide
posts.excerpt: Discover how the right gemstone can strengthen weak planets and bring balance to your life according to Vedic astrology.
posts.content:
Planetary Gemstones

Ruby for Sun, Pearl for Moon, Red Coral for Mars—each planet has its healing stone.

Choosing Wisely

Consult your birth chart before wearing any gemstone. Visit cosmicjyoti.com for personalized recommendations.

posts.title: Numerology and Your Life Path Number
posts.excerpt: Your Life Path number reveals your core purpose and natural talents. Learn how to calculate and interpret yours.
posts.content:
Finding Your Life Path

Add the digits of your birth date until you get a single digit (1–9) or master numbers 11, 22.

What It Means

Each number carries unique energy. Use our Numerology tool at cosmicjyoti.com for a full analysis.
